games.name: Amasis in a bind
games.description: The year is 525 BC and Amasis II is the ruler in Egypt, when he recieves a troubling herald from, Cambyses II king of the mighty Persian Empire.

games.name: Into the Sinai Desert
games.description: After being decieved by Amasis II, Cambyses II resolves to invade Egypt
